alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Columbus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 17 at 2:02PM EST until December 17 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Brunswick County in southeastern North Carolina... Columbus County in southeastern North Carolina... * Until 300 PM EST. * At 202 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Nakina, or 15 miles south of Whiteville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Tabor City, Chadbourn, Bethel, Lake Waccamaw, Fair Bluff, Freeland, Hallsboro, Nakina, Redbug, Exum, Bughill, Southeastern Community College, Williams, Honey Island, Cherry Grove, Old Dock, Mollie, Sidney, and Clarendon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for southeastern North Carolina.
